index.infoSection:
# By students, for students. Free & Open Source.
TUfast is the #1 productivity tool for students at TU Dresden .
For two years now we are developing together with you and the FSRs the perfect product for your everyday student life.

Find out more about the project on this site and install TUfast now!

sections: TUfast was released in 05.2020, is [open-source](https://github.com/TUfast-TUD/TUfast_TUD),  developed by students and has 2500+ users as of 01.01.2022. For two years now we are developing together with you and the FSRs the perfect product for your everyday student life.
We aim at providing TUfast for 5000 students and employees at TU Dresden, as well as for at least one more school in saxony.

# What does TUfast do?
TUfast provides a bunch of functions to speed up your everyday student life. Among them are:

- AutoLogin in all online-platforms of TU Dresden 
 - Quick-accesses and hotkeys to many platform 
 - Supports SELMA, OPAL, OWA und viele mehr 
 - Overview of all your OPAL-courses as well as improvements for OPAL itself. 
 - ... and many more you will find when using TUfast ;)
TUfast has been reported to **save 2000 Clicks and 90 minutes per semester!**

# Is TUfast secure?
 The TUfast-Extension saves user data exclusively locally on your computer. If you uninstall the extension all data will be removed. As we care about user data and privacy TUfast is currently scrutineered by the Informationssicherheit of TU Dresden. Here you can read the full [privacy notice](/datenschutz) on TUfast.

# Further information
 The project is currently been supported by:

- Mrs. Jantos (coordinator eLearning) and Mr Jantos (product manager of SELMA)
